title: league secrets
body: do you have any cool hacks, secrets ,tips,or cheats. if so pls comment and share them XD.

replies.body: Between you and me, alt+F4 fixes *any* issue you'll have in the game, from toxicity to 'OP' champions.
so, assuming that you aren't going along with his joke here...alt F4 will close the currently running program.
lol. It would be funny if they actually did that. So long as they remember to reconnect afterwards.

Hold the restart button on your PC for a min of 3-4 min. When it restarts, restart it again without logging in. Unplug the PC now completely and turn it on. Get in game and BOOM, you got a 250IP reward. Tell me if you face any problems.
